pr_title: Feature/grading instructions/display sgi in assessment view fix

timeline.message: add example criterion when initializing the editor as suggested by Martin

timeline.bodyText:
please add a JSDoc comment here, that this method connects the GradingInstruction with the Feedback
link/reference the corresponding drop method in the JSDoc
timeline.author: krusche

timeline.bodyText:
please add a JSDoc comment here, that this method connects the GradingInstruction with the Feedback
link/reference the corresponding drag method in the JSDoc

timeline.message:
-add documentation for the drop/drop methods
-show SGIs in the example submission view of text and modeling exercises
set grading criteria in the GET calls of the different exercise types: text, fileUpload and modeling
add switch toggle to switch between SGI and GI
add new switch toggle component to allow switching between SGI and GI
adapt branch to new client structure
add toggle between SGI and GI
Add and enable save a new grading criteria entry
display grading instructions of each criterion in the corresponding editor
enable editing the grading instructions of a criterion and saving them
enable deleting a criteria and its corresponding instructions

- when exercise has no criteria nor instructions then add a dummy element
- add new element to instructions array when gradingCriteriaCommand is triggered

- remove hiding the instruction command workaround by adding the displayCommand Flag.
- modify the parsing method to allow adding instructions via the opening identifiers
delete edit-structured-grading-instruction component since it is required to only have one markdown editor for all criteria of an exercise

-enable adding criteria and multiple instructions to a criterion in the markdown editor
-differentiate between stand-alone instructions and instructions that belong to a criterion
use htmlForMarkdown pipe in the SGI editor preview
add drag and drop function to text and file upload exercises
allow drag and drop to general feedback field for all exercise types
Add SGI to Tutor exercise dashboard before tutor participates and clicks on "I have read the instructions"
add new feedback button: could be used by tutors in case they are assessing an element that is missing in the student's submission
Merge with develop & resolve merge conflicts.
load SGI(s) at tutor assessment page
add client tests for structured grading instructions commands

timeline.author: sascha11110
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -33,6 +33,7 @@
             "sampleSolution": "Beispiel Lösung",
             "gradingInstructions": "Benotungshinweise",
             "structuredGradingInstructions": "Strukturierte Benotungshinweise",
+            "DragDropInstruction": "Drag & Drop Bewetungshinweis zum Feedback Element",

timeline.bodyText: You might want to refactor the duplicated code for allowDrop() and drop() (1).
timeline.author: sascha11110

replies.bodyText: This drop() is for the feedback elements with reference. The other methods are for general feedback. I refactored the general feedback drop method further and used the assessment-general-feedback component for the text and file-upload exercises as well. Thank you for noticing this.
replies.author: HanyaElhashemy

timeline.bodyText: You might want to refactor the duplicated code for allowDrop() and drop() (2).
timeline.author: sascha11110

timeline.bodyText: You might want to refactor the duplicated code for allowDrop() and drop() (3).
timeline.author: sascha11110

timeline.message: fix issue reported by Sascha: not showing SGI in the assessment view

timeline.bodyText: As stated above..can you refactor that? Somehow merge drop and allow drop?
timeline.author: alextsakpinis

replies.bodyText: drop and allowDrop can't be merged as they are triggered on different events. If you have a look at the html you will see that allowDrop is triggered on dragover and not on drop.
replies.author: HanyaElhashemy

timeline.message: refactor drop and allowDrop of general feedback
add necessary imports to the test file

timeline.message: change ev to event and add its type
display SGI in exercise detail view as well
add necessary import to client tests

-add table header to markdown editor preview
-change count to maxCountInScore
disable drop of SGI on general feedback text area
add usage count to tutor assessment view

remove console log
add translation to SGI parameters
adjust client side test cases to the new name of usage count
adding command buttons to grading instructions editor
added HTML for structured grading instructions
adding html component to grading instruction editor
combining all 4 commands to one command
add changelog of new mysql table: grading_instruction
adding controller, repository and service for grading_instruction
implemented get, create, delete and update method for grading instruction
add authorization check for delete method
test case for creating grading instruction
add test case for deleting grading instructions
test that students don't get information about grading instructions
remove transactional annotation and all other redundant spring annotaions
Use plural for route's entities (naming convention)
on delete of exercises delete all its grading instructions
change findByExercise method argument type to primitive
change findOne method argument type to primitive
add authorization check to create and update gradingInstruction
adding more test cases to GradingInstructionIntegrationTest
add some assertions for the remaining attributes
Add grading criteria entity, resource, repository,service and modified the changelog by adding the new grading_criteria table
Add CRUD Rest calls for grading criteria and add reference to exercise table

change the data-model by integrating the grading criteria and setting it as the parent of the structured grading instructions also deleted redundant rest calls. Put and Post calls of the text/modeling/fileUpload exercises got refactored accordingly
Code-Cleanup: delete GradingInstructionService and some methods of GradingCriteriaService
Fix server tests after bad merge

Apply PR review feedback:
 - renamed GradingCriteria to GradingCriterion
 - removed mapping method and modified the setters for criteria in exercise instead
 - added more tests for SGI
